Name: Moeras
About the game: Moeras is a short action-adventure game about an archer that's guarding a swamp. Features 10-15 minutes of gameplay. Cool archery mechanic. Procedural animations. A big swamp, and a beach. Controls WASD keys to move. Move the mouse to rotate the camera. Left mouse button to shoot. Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
